description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to mitigate the risk of flooding, reduce groundwater overdraft, increase industrial and domestic water supply, and raise farmers' income from irrigated agriculture in the arid Turpan Basin of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PA/Schedule/Section I/A | Description :Maintain the PLG and PLGO at the regional level and PLGs, PMOs and EGs atthe prefecture and county levels throughout implementation with qualified and adequate staff. | Due Date :30-Sep-2016

Finance Agreement :PA/Schedule/Section IV/1(a) | Description :Not later than two months after the Effective Date, establish afinancial and procurement management information system acceptable to the Bank | Due Date :28-Dec-2010

Finance Agreement :PA/Schedule/Section IV/1(b) | Description :Not later than December 31, 2011 establish the Internet based systemreferred to in Component 1(a) of the project and commence to monitor and evaluate the ET variations and water allocations. | DueDate :31-Dec-2011

Finance Agreement :PA/Schedule/Section IV/1(c) | Description :Not later than December 31, 2012 have the ET-based supplementary planreferred to in Component 1(c) of the Project approved by the Prefecture and effective. | Due Date :31-Dec-2012

Finance Agreement :PA/Schedule/Section IV/1(d) | Description :Not later than December 31, 2013 establish in the Prefecture theET-based water rights system referred to in component 1(e) of the project and make such system applicable to the management plans |Due Date :31-Dec-2013

Finance Agreement :PA/Schedule/Section IV/1(e) | Description :Not later than as indicated in the monitoring indicators set forth inthe Annex 3 of the PAD, establish and thereafter maintain, atleast 43 WUAs to be responsible for the operation and maint | Due Date:31-Dec-2015

Finance Agreement :PA/Schedule/Section IV/1(f) | Description :Not later than December 31, 2011: (i) establish, and thereaftermaintain, an ET management center to manage the activities referredto in component 1(a) of the project as a public service age |Due Date :31-Dec-2011
